name: Day One of My New Life

passive.name: At This Very Moment
passive.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. After entering battle, increases All-Type RES of all allies by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color>. Effects of the same type cannot stack.
